```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(DBI)
library(RPostgres)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
source(here::here("r", "connect_to_pulse.R"))

# Connect using your environment variables
con <- connect_to_pulse()

# Use lowercase table names (Postgres lowercases everything)
steps <- dbReadTable(con, "pipeline_step")
rules <- dbReadTable(con, "rule_library")
meta  <- dbReadTable(con, "metadata")
```

# Pipeline Steps
```{r}
knitr::kable(steps)
```

# Governing Rule Library
```{r}
knitr::kable(rules)
```

# Core Metadata Dictionary
```{r}
knitr::kable(meta)
```
